text: aur jo kuchh khuda ne toojhe de rakha hai usamen aakhirat ke ghar kee bhee justajoo kar aur duniya se jis qadar tera hissa hai mat bhool ja aur jis tarah khuda ne tere saath ehasaan kiya hai too bhee auron ke saath ehasaan kar aur rue zameen mein phasaad ka khvaaha na ho-isamen shak nahin ki khuda fasaad karane vaalon ko dost nahin rakhata
